attributes.action: Recognise The Republic of Rat Island, Newsham Park, Liverpool as an independant state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If successful we will then ask the UN and EU for grants to construct the follwing: super casino, stadium, Mens Hospital, Make all caves en-suite, Harry Ramsdems, and the Banana Grove Night CLub.
Our Immigration Policy will be set to 'tight'
It will be a tax haven and ciggie/booze runs to the local Kellys Wines will be allowed.
No faceless supermarkets yet we will allow a Summer Aldi and Big Lidl

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
